text: Kwilu Province is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Bandundu. The province takes its name from the Kwilu River, which crosses the province from south to north. ==Administrative areas== Towns and territories are: * Bagata * Bulungu-Kikwit * Gungu * Idiofa * Mangai * Masi-Manimba ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Kwilu Province
